articles.author: Jatin Grover
articles.title: India considers replacing older SIMs as Chinese chips trigger security scare
articles.description: India is considering a proposal to replace older mobile phone SIMs after an investigation by the nation’s top cybersecurity agency found samples of chipsets of Chinese origin in some SIM cards
